MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in PR8 postcode area of Southport, affecting properties in Liverpool Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.24PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:55PM on 10th January 2021
